EmailTemplate.name: New MLC Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Your DealChicken Case {!Case.Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Contact}, We just wanted to let you know we've received your inquiry into our support system. We'll be reaching out to you shortly to help get you on your way, we look forward to working with you soon.
Warmest Regards, The DealChicken Merchant Team
